requirements.summary: Revert all frontend source files, components, pages, hooks, contexts, and configuration to their exact state at Version 8, discarding all Version 9 changes
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed application matches the state and behavior of Version 8.
All Version 9 changes are fully reverted.
The application builds and deploys without errors.
All features present in Version 8 are functional after the revert.
